isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - ENGINE ELECTRICAL - Main Engine Wiring Harness - Inspection

svcproc.title: Inspection
svcproc.para: Carefully inspect the wiring harness for worn conduits, frayed insulation, or heat damage on wires.
Inspect each connector for the following conditions. Repair or replace as required:

item.para: Corroded connectors, green or gray-white deposits on the metal terminals
Female connector sleeves spread open (Use a Terminal Test Adapter Kit.)
Terminals incorrectly latched into connector body or "pushed back" relative to other terminals in the same connector
